content:
cilium-operator troubleshoot 
 Run troubleshooting utilities to check control-plane connectivity 
 Options 
   -h, --help   help for troubleshoot
 
 SEE ALSO 
 
 cilium-operator 	 - Run cilium-operator 
 cilium-operator troubleshoot clustermesh 	 - Troubleshoot connectivity towards remote clusters 
 cilium-operator troubleshoot kvstore 	 - Troubleshoot connectivity towards the etcd kvstore
